detail: cohort_size_gte_10: cohort has at least 10 projects
required_archetypes_present: required archetype coverage is complete
baseline_results_complete: every project has complete baseline test evidence
migration_artifacts_present: every project includes audit/rewrite/lockstep/rollback artifacts
post_validation_deterministic: repeated validation runs are deterministic (flaky rate < 1%)
per_project_success_rule: each project either reaches >=95% pass or documents known incompatibilities
cohort_success_rate_rule: cohort-wide success rate is at least 80%
aggregate_consistency: aggregate counters match project-level data
version_pinning_complete: each cohort project is pinned to a repo+commit
ci_reproducibility_flags: artifact explicitly marks deterministic and CI-reproducible outcomes
